response.overview: Shaun is the Night Bird - a small-town superhero who dreams of becoming part of the South African Superhero League. When Crimson, a famous superhero and member of the League, lands at the nearby Tikbrug, the Nightingale rushes to his aid. Together they deal with thugs who use a drug to give them temporary superpower. Shaun publishes a video recording of their heroic deeds on the internet that attracts a lot of attention, but then his friend Kyle is kidnapped and the villains claim their drugs back. Will the Night Bird, with Crimson's help, save Kyle and join the League?
response.title: Nagvoël
